title: I'm so focking tired of you riot.
body:
I just wanted to start a ranked game and what happened? someone left during champion select... it doesn't have to be their fault.. it could be because of the 'must lock in to play' update or because of their internet. But riot you could do something like give them a focking temporal ban or something. Why is it that i have to wait one and a half hours to play one goddamn ranked game? If you don't do something about this, many of us are gonna stop playing even if we don't want to. There'll be one day where the most of us are gonna make this decision. You could stop that if you do something about this irritating thing called "leaving". Who's with me?
{{sticker:sg-shisa}}

replies.body:
I ain't with ya tbh.
Can't see any reason for banning people due problems with either their internet connection nor problems with the still in beta (i believe) client which got several new features which might be the reason for instabilities
